jsx.client
Class Cookie

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Configurable
          jsx.client.Cookie

public class Cookie
extends Configurable

A class of cookie objects, with its static methods, providing utilities for managing client-side persistence.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

store

public static void store(Cookie cookie,
                         java.lang.Number sec,
                         java.lang.String path,
                         java.lang.String domain,
                         boolean secure)

Persists a cookie object.

Parameters:
cookie - The cookie object to persist.
sec - The max-age attribute in seconds of the cookie.
path - The path attribute of the cookie.
domain - The domain attribute of the cookie.
secure - The secure attribute of the cookie.
Since:
1.0

remove

                          java.lang.String path,
                          java.lang.String domain,

Removes a cookie from the browsers local store.

Parameters:
cookie - The cookie object to persist.

domain - The domain attribute of the cookie.
secure - The secure attribute of the cookie.
Since:

isEnabled

public static final boolean isEnabled()

Determine whether cookies are enabled.

Returns:
true if they appear to be enabled and false otherwise.
Since:
1.0
